title: Matchsafe, "Tomb of Washington, Mt. Vernon, Virginia", 1900–10
title_raw: Tomb of Washington, Mt. Vernon, Virginia
provenance: Collection of Carol B. Brener and Stephen W. Brener
creditline: Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener
description: Rectangular, curved top and bottom, featuring horizontal, sepia-toned, hand colored, photographic image of George Washington's house, inscribed below "Washington's Mansion, Mt. Vernon, VA.", reverse features  horizontal, sepia-toned, hand colored, photographic image of Washington's gated tomb with foliage and obelisks to right and left, inscribed below "The Tomb of Washington, Mount Vernon, VA.", "Souvenir" inscribed on side panel below Tomb image. Lid hinged on side. Striker on bottom.

tombstone.epitaph: Matchsafe, "Tomb of Washington, Mt. Vernon, Virginia", 1900–10. Plated metal, printed celluloid. Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener. 1980-14-684.
